医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究揭示幽门螺杆菌诱发胃癌的分子机制幽门螺杆菌 (H. pylori) 感染通常与腹痛、腹胀和胃酸过多有关。临床证据表明，感染幽门螺杆菌 cagA+ 菌株会显着增加患胃癌的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230718/Study-reveals-molecular-mechanisms-of-H-pylori-induced-gastric-carcinogenesis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230718/Study-reveals-molecular-mechanisms-of-H-pylori-induced-gastric-carcinogenesis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=03ed1531-7698-4951-9177-c951a57b4714 Tue, 18 Jul 2023 15:33:08 -0400 Study reveals molecular mechanisms of H. pylori-induced gastric carcinogenesis
新颖的几何深度学习模型改进了中风病变分割缺血性中风是当大脑中的血管被血栓堵塞时发生的，是全世界死亡的主要原因之一。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230718/Novel-geometric-deep-learning-model-improves-中风-lesion-segmentation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230718/Novel-geometric-deep-learning-model-improves-中风-lesion-segmentation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=35cec1d5-9527-46f6-ada8-2605d847539e Tue, 18 Jul 2023 15:25:28 -0400 Novel geometric deep learning model improves stroke lesion segmentation
EAE Hub 模型减少了早期自闭症诊断的障碍印第安纳大学医学院研究人员领导的一项新研究表明，接受专门培训的初级保健临床医生可以对超过 80% 的发育迟缓幼儿做出准确的自闭症诊断，这提供了令人信服的证据，表明基于社区的自闭症评估模型是一种潜在的方法改善对这一所需服务的访问的解决方案。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230718/EAE-Hub-model-reduces-barriers-to-early-autism-diagnosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230718/EAE-Hub-model-reduces-barriers-to-early-autism-diagnosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9b2e9663-5af0-4f62-bdb6-29dc95f14fb2 Tue, 18 Jul 2023 15:20:47 -0400 EAE Hub model reduces barriers to early autism diagnosis
“周末战士”锻炼模式可提供与常规体力活动类似的心脏健康益处那些在忙碌的工作周中很难找到时间锻炼的人可能会将中等至剧烈的身体活动集中在一周或周末的一到两天。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230718/Weekend-warrior-exercise-pattern-provides-similar-heart-health-benefits-as-regular-physical-activity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230718/Weekend-warrior-exercise-pattern-provides-similar-heart-health-benefits-as-regular-physical-activity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6d9d6602-f98a-4c32-beb1-3e16ca158fa3 Tue, 18 Jul 2023 15:02:44 -0400 "Weekend warrior" exercise pattern provides similar heart health benefits as regular physical activity
基于人工智能的分析方法加速细胞结构研究BESSY II 的高亮度 X 射线可用于生成空间分辨率低至几十纳米的显微图像。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230718/AI-based-analysis-method-accelerates-study-of-cell-structs.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230718/AI-based-analysis-method-accelerates-study-of-cell-structs.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=558c629f-3ceb-4d65-a40b-8d2fd5b50c9c Tue, 18 Jul 2023 14:55:28 -0400 AI-based analysis method accelerates study of cell structures
MCW 教授获得 NIH 1300 万美元拨款，用于研究 AMD 和阿尔茨海默氏症的错位钙化威斯康星医学院 (MCW) 教授兼生物物理学系主任 Francesca Marassi 博士获得美国国立卫生研究院 (NIH) 颁发的为期五年、价值 1300 万美元的项目拨款 (PPG)，用于研究患有年龄相关性黄斑变性（AMD）和阿尔茨海默病（AD）的患者的眼睛和大脑。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230718/MCW-professor-awarded-2413-million-NIH-grant-to-study-misplaced-calcification-in-AMD-and-Alzheimers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230718/MCW-professor-awarded-2413-million-NIH-grant-to-study-misplaced-calcification-in-AMD-and-Alzheimers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=20b5ab11-7618-4fab-8500-cfe1762684a8 Tue, 18 Jul 2023 14:46:59 -0400 MCW professor awarded $13 million NIH grant to study misplaced calcification in AMD and Alzheimer's
现场健康中心改善建筑工人的心理健康新的研究正在解决建筑行业的心理健康危机——强调了现场健康中心对工人福祉的好处。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230718/On-site-Health-Hub-improves-mental-wellbeing-of-construction-workers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230718/On-site-Health-Hub-improves-mental-wellbeing-of-construction-workers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5aa07a31-8167-4270-b51f-d23bfbea29f6 Tue, 18 Jul 2023 14:40:14 -0400 On-site Health Hub improves mental wellbeing of construction workers
研究发现 DHX9 基因突变与神经发育障碍之间的联系感谢来自贝勒医学院 GREGoR 研究中心、香港中文大学、德国小鼠诊所和合作机构。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230718/Study-finds-link- Between-DHX9-gene-mutations-and-neurodevelopmental-disorders.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230718/Study-finds-link- Between-DHX9-gene-mutations-and-neurodevelopmental-disorders.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=aeb9078f-ca83-413f-8fa4-a989589a7f76 Tue, 18 Jul 2023 14:37:00 -0400 Study finds link between DHX9 gene mutations and neurodevelopmental disorders
CEPI 和 HMRI 合作加速大流行疫苗的开发CEPI、流行病防范创新联盟和休斯敦卫理公会研究所 (HMRI) 今天宣布建立合作伙伴关系，将尖端人工智能 (AI) 技术与现有的实验室技术相结合，以加快针对新型病毒威胁的未来疫苗的开发（也称为疾病 X）。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230718/CEPI-and-HMRI-partner-to-accelerate-development-of-pandemic-vaccines.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230718/CEPI-and-HMRI-partner-to-accelerate-development-of-pandemic-vaccines.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d5bae52d-240f-4563-b222-aa6dd2f77c5c Tue, 18 Jul 2023 13:38:58 -0400 CEPI and HMRI partner to accelerate development of pandemic vaccines
水稻生物工程师获得美国国立卫生研究院资助镰状细胞病研究莱斯大学生物工程师 Gang Bao 和他的团队获得了美国国立卫生研究院为期 4 年、价值 260 万美元的资助，用于解决围绕使用基因编辑治疗镰状细胞病的安全性和有效性的关键问题。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230718/Rice-bioengineers-receive-NIH-grant-for-sickle-cell-disease-research.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230718/Rice-bioengineers-receive-NIH-grant-for-sickle-cell-disease-research.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a10e0a5b-16fe-4813-a74d-a521cf01bb0d Tue, 18 Jul 2023 13:32:56 -0400 Rice bioengineers receive NIH grant for sickle cell disease research
